lenders.name: BBfH c/o Greta
lenders.occupational_info:
Building Blocks for Humanity started when a few volunteers from the Anne Frank Museum Exhibit in Albuquerque, NM decided they still wanted to see each other and do good work.   

For seven years the group would have potluck dinners, through $5 - $10 in the kitty and kibbitz over dinner what organizations would recieve their funds.

Their mission statement was to support victims of terror or any organization bringing peace and a better life to the city, state, nation or the world.

The group has now become a simple supper group.  Kiva.org was one of the last things they did.  I have been charged with the duty to continue to give our 2 $25 donations to women throughout the world.

In addition to Kiva, this group has supported Madre, Naral, Righteous Christians (those that hid Jews in WWII), Friends of Mogan David of Israel, Heifer, and many more.

We hope our group will inspire others to do the same.  And we're happy to continue re-gifting our money here on Kiva.org.

I believe that the internet is the only truly democratic forum available to the people of the world and that it can be a power for good as Kiva has clearly proved.

lenders.name: marcolo
lenders.loan_because:
People will work for a better life if given the chance. It transcends class and culture, as we are born under circumstances not of our own choosing. We can only try to make this life better using the gifts we're given.

Good is good. Kind is kind. Both begets both. Pass it on.

lenders.name: ann
lenders.loan_because: It is time to share.  Finally in a position to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a non profit restaurant using seasonal and local ingredients with one day a week as a pay if you can basis.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
I want to do what I can to make the world a better place. It is my hope that the people who receive my Kiva loans are: 
a) Successful in their business and continue to build their business even through difficult times.
b) Find ways to shape their business so it helps themselves and at the same time helps other people and also does no harm to other people or the environment.
c) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to further their own education in ways that are focused on improving their business.  
d) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to advance the education of their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters).
e) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to provide for their own retirement
f) Continue to be successful in their business eventually have enough financial resources to become a Kiva lender and make loans to others.

I believe one of the most important things that the people who receive my Kiva loans can do with their money after their business is running smoothly is to advance the education for themselves, their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters). It is my hope that the people who receive my Kiva loans are able to somehow find a way for themselves, their spouse and all their children (sons and daughters) to attend at least high school and 2 years of college leading to a High School Diploma and Associate Degree. Through education we are better able to understand and help ourselves, our family, our business, our community and the world.

If any of the people who have received my loans are having difficulty finding educational opportunities that they can afford that will help their business or they are having difficulty finding ways for themselves or their children to pursue a High School Diploma or Associate Degree then I encourage them to contact me and I will try to assist them.
lenders.occupational_info: An electrical engineer is a  person who designs industrial and consumer items that use electricity including computers, network appliances, radios, televisions, electrical motors/generators, electrical power distribution systems and communications systems. I am a vegetarian and I volunteer with the American  Red Cross. Some of my hobbies include amateur radio, amateur astronomy, general aviation, yoga, meditation, ballroom dancing and Tae Kwon Do.

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: We are all Gods children and have to help each other out ;o)

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Our country has an economic advantage that most of us take for granted.  Even as a student, I can afford to make small loans which help equalize economically.  It would be unfair for me NOT to participate with an organization such as KIVA.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I find joy in helping people become empowered to improve their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: Terix is an independent, Silicon Valley-based provider of hardware and software maintenance services. We serve more than 900 customers in the US and around the world.

lenders.name: Mikkel Christoffersen
lenders.loan_because: We want to help, but we've lost faith in the Big Aid Machine, where most of the funds seem to go to administration and salaries for celebrity endorsers. Kiva is exactly what we were looking for.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with digital libraries and strategies

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I've lived in my car, showered at the YMCA, slept on a rented couch in a mobile home, and I've begged and I've borrowed - all so I could get an education (Ph.D in Chemistry) and change my future.  I know what it means to have nothing but potential.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We should BE the change we want to see in the world. Kiva rocks!
lenders.occupational_info: I fix Nissan cars, get new ones ready to sell, change the oil and tires and service cars currently being used everyday. Now, some of my working wages can make a difference for someone world wide. How could one refuse such an opportunity? Now, religion is no barrier, politicians are no barrier, borders and languages are crossed with the click of a mouse! "Love your neighbor as yourself" can be demonstrated by putting your effort into action. Kiva is truly a beautiful thing!

lenders.name: Meghan & Paige
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my two children and I work in a doctors office helping out the doctor.

lenders.name: Kadio
lenders.loan_because: Others need just a little support to start a new sustanaible life by providing basic loan schemes.
lenders.occupational_info:
We also serve as a charity humanitarian organisation empowering orphans, less privilege and war affected children through the provision of basic educational opportunities.

As Women Empowerment and Child Protection is at the heart of our Mission, we have initiated a Loan Scheme Project in Pastry and Cake Decoration for Teenage girls.We promote Children and Women rights through Short term trainings and other empowerment initiatives.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting people
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a former civil servant/former UN official, now living partly in the country and consulting at home and overseas. I feel honoured to have visited so many countries of the world and seen how hard people work for a living, and am glad to be able to support a few.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: This is the right way to make the world better; by helping those that are trying to be self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Jemimah

lenders.loan_because: I do it because I seem to think in the shoes of the Loaner not as the lender a humane service to good and to humanity

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: It's helping others and giving back

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because:
"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world."  ~Anne Frank~

"I am only one, but I am one.  I cannot do everything, but I can do something.  And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do."  ~Edward Everett Hale~

"What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.” ~Albert Pike~

lenders.name: Jana
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have had lots of people help me be successful and I want to "pay it forward".  I am very excited to be part of this community of generous people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Chief Sales Officer for a financial consulting firm.  I design stragegies for growth and through my employees expand our ability to serve clients.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I received help to become a nurse and now I want to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a nurse who did hospice work, helping dying patients and their families

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: microloans to the most deserving is capitalism in its finest hour; it's the right thing to do and in one small way makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist in ongoing training for global telecommunications support specialists, who then work on call centers around the world, keeping the call center telecom infrastructure up and running.

lenders.name: Neel & Family
lenders.loan_because: micro-finance loans help people become self-sufficient. Every bit counts. Please help out, if you can.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with more than enough in my life and want to share what I can with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a global bank and manage technology projects for them.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: Kiva enables me to.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because:
I know how critical a loan can be for anyone wanting to improve their lives, their communities and thereby the world.
I primarily invest in Farming and food-related activities as I used to be a farmer and seller of vegetables at farmers markets, and I know how it is never-ending work for little money, but very rewarding in many other ways, deeply educational, and a critical glue for rural communities.
I have been without access to money at various times in my life; I realize how fortunate I am, and would prefer to invest in people and communities rather than corporations or other non-human "persons".
lenders.occupational_info:
I research, develop and sell Electric Vehicles.
I build and repair radiation detection equipment so individuals may protect and educate themselves.
I'm helping to develop an educational service for radiation testing of locally harvested food and seafood for individuals.

lenders.name: Friends
lenders.loan_because:
being able to give is a gift.  

"If you have two shirts, give one to the poor. If you have food, share it with those who are hungry." - this is a very simple way of our humble attempt to do this.

lenders.name: Brendon and Hilary
lenders.loan_because: To help break the cycle of Poverty which often breeds ignorance and resentment - fertile ground for treading the path to the Dark Side.  And everyone should be as happy as they choose to be.
lenders.occupational_info: Healthcare

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: In Jesus' name, I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a home for the elderly.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I started our own retail business from scratch almost 20 years ago with no employees and without the help of a bank.  It was very hard work but very rewarding. We now have a larger business and 10 employees. Now that we have a successful retail business, I feel like we should return the favor to help other small business get started.
lenders.occupational_info: Every day I encourage my employees to do the best job possible helping customers to meet their needs.  I spend most of my time training them in understanding the product they sell and encouraging great customer service.  I keep constant track of my finances and try to understand good business principals of inventory turn and profit margins.  If the business is not making a profit...there is no business.  Managing people and maintaining good financial business practices takes a lot of passion, discipline and time.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: my small gesture makes a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and want to pass along to others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a dental office and help people keep their teeth healthy.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I've read too many articles and books about how the US has exploited developing countries through unpayable ecomonic deals and I want to be a part of the change to that perception
lenders.occupational_info: I build out work spaces for businesses: corporate, technology firms, entertainment houses, etc; working with designers and contractors to take the idea of a space through realization

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: God has given so much to me.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is right, and fair, and just, to share.

lenders.name: Wes
lenders.loan_because: We have to invest in those trying to better themselves individually if we want a better world for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: work for a corporation

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: Leave the world better than when you came in.

lenders.name: Sofie
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for, I want to help other people who do not have so much.
lenders.occupational_info:
My friend and I do a job called "mother's helper". We babysit, take care of animals and plants, and help clean up our local lake.  
I love to dance and sing.

lenders.name: Mdote
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe we are in this together. I am a first generation refugee and I am a business owner so I know their struggles trying simply to live and to make a living.

lenders.name: Glaucia & Paul
lenders.loan_because: Once we learnt about Kiva, and how easy it is to support a small business anywhere in the world, doing nothing was not an option!  And we like the connection it provides between us and the entrepreneur, anywhere in the world - a world without borders.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in management of a major utility in Perth, and Paul works in mining.

lenders.name: Breianne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the world heal poverty issues.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide a variety of holistic healing techniques to heal the body, mind and soul.

lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I need to pass it on!!

lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in Japan.

lenders.loan_because: we are all one

lenders.occupational_info: A traditional housewife. It is more satisfying to see someone succeed because of my small contribution

lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that people get what they pay for and pay for what they get.

lenders.name: Sally

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital, helping sick people with their diet and nutrition.

lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with so much, and want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world - I am a teacher.

lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life.

lenders.name: Lui
lenders.loan_because: I feel that every person in this world should be given a chance to better their life.  These are not people looking for a free hand out but rather mothers and fathers looking to use their knowledge and skill set to provide for their family.  One must exploit their entrepreneural spirt. I will continue to admire and help these business people as much as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I pride myself in working along side my brother fixing houses up and selling them. I also enjoy helping my brother come up with marketing ideas for a product called the Germ Terminator.

lenders.name: Chief Mike
lenders.loan_because: Large banking corporations will never be able to provide a "Micro-Finance" service such as this does!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a volunteer in various education projects in the Philippines (esp. OLPC-Philippines, Farmer's field school, KVFMPC (A market vender's and small farmer's micro finance cooperative), Kalibo Public Elementary School II/Aklan Special Education Center.

lenders.name: Joakim Jardenberg
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a break. Kiva is amazing.
lenders.occupational_info:
Founder and CEO of Mindpark AB.
Senior advisor in all things internet and media. Old, new, digital. Some call me a social media therapist. CEO whisperer.
Business angel and investor in early stage tech startups.
I write, lecture, speak, facilitate and moderate large and small groups.
